title: (x) 'Is here!' Swash Font - Bookman Swash Italic {Florian}
content:
The closest I've come to IDing this font is 'Bodoni Classic-Bold Swashes', but it isn't quite a match.

Any ideas?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042442/http:/typophile.com/files/font_0.JPG) | 190.41 KB |
author: hmarcks

comments.content:
A modified [|Caslon Bold Italic with Swashes](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042442/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-caslon/bold-italic-swash/characters.html)??

--- Tamas Ferencz ---

Hi Hunter,

thatâ€™s [Bookman Swash Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042442/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2833). [Jukebox Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042442/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000085#flont) is similar.  
F
